title: All About You
lyrics: it's all about you, it's all about you baby. it's all about you, it's all about you. yesterday you asked me something i thought you knew so i told you with a smile it's all about you then you whispered in my ear and told me to said you made my life worth while it's all about you and i would answer all your wishes if you ask me to but if you deny me one of your kisses don't know what i do so hold me close and say three words like you used to do dancing on the kitchen tiles it's all about you yeah     and i would answer all your wishes if you ask me to but if you deny me one of your kisses don't know what i do so hold me c lose and say three words like you used to do dancing on the kitchen tiles yeah you make my life worth while so i told you with the smile it's all about you yeah it's all about you, it's all about you baby it's all about you, it's all about you baby
